name: ts-httpexceptions
description: Provide exception for HTTP Rest API

scripts.prepublish: npm run tsc:es5 && npm run tsc:es6 && npm run tsc:dec
scripts.coverage: npm run test-cov && npm run test-remap
scripts.release:major: npm version major && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.test: npm run tsc:test && mocha --reporter spec --check-leaks --bail test/
scripts.test:travis: istanbul cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- --reporter spec --check-leaks test/

author: Romakita
